titleInfo.title: Does Prenatal Stress Shape Postnatal Resilience? – An Epigenome-Wide Study on Violence and Mental Health in Humans

Serpeloni F, Radtke KM, Hecker T, Sill J, Vukojevic V, Assis SG de, Schauer M, Elbert T, Nätt D (2019)
